c53ce266132145423a95034f111ad7dd (12:40): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: I‚Äôm confused ‚Äî http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/multipage/webappapis.html#event-handlers-on-elements,-document-objects,-and-window-objects lists `oninput` as one of the ‚Äúevent handlers (and their corresponding event handler event types) that must be supported by all HTML elements, as both content attributes and IDL attributes, and on Document and Window objects, as I
c53ce266132145423a95034f111ad7dd (12:40): DL attributes‚Äù
